code: export var marketReducers=function marketReducers(state,action){var list=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));switch(action.type){case"INSERT_ITEM":list.push(action.payload);localStorage.setItem('token',JSON.stringify(list));return{list:list,currentIndex:-1};case"DELETE_ITEM":list.splice(action.payload,1);localStorage.setItem('token',JSON.stringify(list));return{list:list,currentIndex:-1};case"UPDATE_ITEM":list[state.currentIndex]=action.payload;localStorage.setItem('token',JSON.stringify(list));return{list:list,currentIndex:-1};case"UPDATE_INDEX":return{list:list,currentIndex:action.payload};default:return state;}};export default marketReducers;
